title: cmd/godoc: inconsistent placement of code vs doc
body:
cleanup/feature request: godoc could be more consistent when showing package
documentation.

From e-mail by Mark Summerfield ( list@qtrac.plus.com ):

"However I've noticed a strange inconsistency. In the Variables section
the order is description then variable; but for functions and methods
you get the name then the signature and then the description. Perhaps
for Variables the order should be the same, i.e., variable and then
description?"
